net.marfgamer.raknet.example

Class RakNetClientBundleExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.raknet.client.RakNetClient
      • net.marfgamer.raknet.example.RakNetClientBundleExample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetClientListener, UnumRakNetPeer

    public class RakNetClientBundleExample
extends RakNetClient
    A simple RakNetClient that is extending RakNetClient in order to connect to the LifeBoat Survival Games server, when it is connected the client disconnects and shuts down
    Author:
    MarfGamer
